src:
لاكازيت وأوباميانج يقودان هجوم أرسنال في مواجهة وولفرهامبتون
02 Nov 2019, 04:31 by القسم الرياضى
القسم الرياضى أعلن الإسباني أوناي إيمري المدير الفني لفريق أرسنال تشكيلة فريقه لمواجهة وولفرهامبتون اليوم، في إطار الجولة 11 من الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز، والتي شهدت تواجد لاكازيت ، أوباميانج في هجوم فريق ارسنال.وجاء التشكيل كالتالي:حراسة المرمى: لينوخط الدفاع: تشامبيرس - سوكراتيس - ديفيد لويز - تيرنيخط الوسط : أوزيل - قندوزي - توريرا - سيبايوس خط الهجوم : لاكازيت - أوباميانج
text:
Energy Minister Rick Perry Says Trump Will Testify With Impeachment
02 Nov 2019, 04:41 by Kim Tae Hwan
2019.11.02 13:41 US Secretary of Energy Rick Perry has rejected testimony regarding the Ukrainian scandal at President Donald Trump's impeachment trial.


Rick Perry Secretary of Energy. / AP

According to a foreign reporter on Monday, the US Department of Energy spokesman said in a statement Monday, "The minister will not participate in interrogation related impeachment." Perry, along with President Trump's private lawyer, Rudy Giuliani, is the key to testifying at the impeachment trial. The US House of Representatives issued a subpoena last July and demanded a hearing at the Ferry and Julian Lawyers. Earlier, Mr. Perry attended U.S. President Borodimir Zelenski more than three times, including as president of the US government. I met President Zelensky. In particular, it is known that he asked for a call from President Trump. However, he insists that there is no inappropriate behavior in this process. President Trump has expressed his intention to resign the Secretary of State after the US House of Representatives demands a hearing on impeachment. "By the end of the year, Perry will be withdrawn from the cabinet," he said. In July, Trump called for a suspicion of corruption by former Vice President Joe Biden, a Democratic presidential candidate, in a telephone call with Ukraine's President Zelensky.
